meaningMnemonic: With a <radical>bamboo</radical> <radical>tree</radical> resting atop your <radical>head</radical>, you devise a <kanji>plan</kanji>. The plan is actually for getting the bamboo tree off of your head. You’re trapped under it.
readingMnemonic: But why is this bamboo tree so heavy? You look to each end of the bamboo and realize that there is a <reading>sack</reading> (さく) tied on each end. Each sack seems to be filled with heavy rocks. Looks like someone made a <kanji>plan</kanji> to trap you here. Now you have to devise a plan to escape!
